qas.question: What does Sony call their social network?

context: <a0_0><b5_0>PlayStation Home<b5_0/><a0_0/> is a virtual 3D social networking service for the PlayStation Network. Home allows users to create a custom <a1_0><b6_0>avatar<b6_0/><a1_0/>, which can be groomed realistically. Users can edit and decorate their <b8_0>personal <a3_0>apartments<b8_0/><a3_0/>, avatars or club houses with free, <a2_0><b7_0>premium<b7_0/><a2_0/> or won content. Users can shop for new items or win prizes from PS3 games, or Home activities. Users interact and connect with friends and customise content in a virtual world. Home also acts as a meeting place for users that want to play <a4_0><b9_0>multiplayer<b9_0/><a4_0/> games with others.
